body:
Comment 10: 
your conclusion doesn't follow from the reason.

code in the standard library is always formatted with gofmt, and you can't commit
changes that is not. so, no, we don't do the gofmt just before releasing, we do it
before every commit so that code in the repository is always correctly formatted.

as this issue is already closed as WAI, please discuss this issue on the golang-nuts
mailing list.
